item.description:
Boston SEO Networking Group meets the first Monday of each month.

We invite local Boston seo, affiliate marketing and search engine marketing professionals in New England area to join us.

New Venue

Robbins Library
700 Massachusetts Avenue
Arlington, MA 02476
ph 781-316-3200

@ Community Room That holds a 100 people

Take The elevator to the basement

Parking: Try on Mass Ave if not there is a lot across the street behind Bank of America & Not Your Average Joe's restaurant

Agenda:

6:30pm to 7pm: Open Networking

Coffee & Goodies served to kick off the new big meeting room location!

Business Card Buffet: drop you card on the networking buffet

7pm to 7:30: 2 Min Elevator Pitch:

* Tell us about you and your business or website interest
* Any networking goal your trying to achieve out of this meeting?
* Share something interesting about your self.

Theme for the night. Share your worst valentines day experience or story.


Guest Speaker

7:30pm to 8:00pm:

Eric Enge
Stone Temple Consulting (STC)
http://www.stonetempl...

SEO PodCast Interviews
SEO Case Studies
SEO Blog

Discussion:
Eric will share his SEO experience and insight to interviewing some of the biggest names in the Internet marketing industry.


Open Roundtable Discussion

8:00 to 8:15pm:

Open Topic

8:15 to 8:30pm Best Websites & Tools: Share your urls & whats working?

Group discussion to share success stories of what else is working?

8:45 to 9:00 pm: Open Roundtable Challenge Discussion:

Get Free SEO Consulting From The SEO Pro's That Attend!

Please be specific about your challenges in your business or website.
3 to 5 min max spent on any one business model.

8:45pm The End

We look forward to seeing you all at this informal Boston search engine round table discussion!


The Cambridge SEO MeetUp

----------------------------------
Guest Speaker's Wanted:

We've been working hard to find industry experts and to develop a formal agenda to keep it interesting for all those that attend at this new big meeting room.
item.how_to_find_us: Meetup pins & signs. You'll find us
item.why: You'll walk out with a few good contacts and lots of great internet marketing tips. People come all the way from Springfield, MA, RI, NH, just to share and learn from this Boston SEO networking group.

group.name: The Cambridge Search Engine Optimization Meetup Group

item.name: Boston Search Engine Optimization February Meetup: New Venue & Guest Speaker!
